metadata.name: Potential Tampering With RDP Related Registry Keys Via Reg.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects the execution of "reg.exe" for enabling/disabling the RDP service on the host by tampering with the 'CurrentControlSet\Control\Terminal Server' values

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\reg.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('reg.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' add ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\currentcontrolset\\control\\terminal server')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('reg_dword')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /f')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('licensing core')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('enableconcurrentsessions')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('winstations\\rdp-tcp')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('maxinstancecount')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('fenablewinstation')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('tsuserenabled')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('tsenabled')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('tsappcompat')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('idlewinstationpoolcount')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('tsadvertise')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('allowtsconnections')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('fsinglesessionperuser')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('fdenytsconnections'))))

output.summary: Detects the execution of "reg.exe" for enabling/disabling the RDP service on the host by tampering with the 'CurrentControlSet\Control\Terminal Server' values
